ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Has this survey been completed?
Rate psychological pain (hurt, anguish, or misery in your mind, not stress, not physical pain)
Rate stress (your general feeling of being pressured or overwhelmed)
Rate agitation (emotional urgency; feeling that you need to take action; not irritation; not annoyance)
Rate hopelessness (your expectation that things will not get better no matter what you do)
Rate self-hate (your general feeling of disliking yourself; having no self-esteem; having no self-respect)
Rate overall risk of suicide
Notes: 1= Extremely low risk (will not kill self); 5= Extremely high risk (will kill self)

ElementDescription: How much is being suicidal related to thoughts and feelings about yourself?
How much is being suicidal related to thoughts and feeling about others?
I wish to live to the following extent
I wish to die to the following extent
Suicidal Thoughts/Feelings
Managed Thoughts/Feelings
Suicidal Behavior
The one thing that would help me no longer feel suicidal would be
Importance 1: Please list your most important reasons for wanting to live
Importance 2: Please list your second most important reasons for wanting to live
Importance 3: Please list your third most important reasons for wanting to live
Importance 4: Please list your fourth most important reasons for wanting to live
Importance 5: Please list your fifth most important reasons for wanting to live
Importance 1: Please list your most important reasons for wanting to die
Importance 2: Please list your second most important reasons for wanting to die
Importance 3: Please list your third most important reasons for wanting to die
Importance 4: Please list your fourth most important reasons for wanting to die
Importance 5: Please list your fifth most important reasons for wanting to die
Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version
